name: Happy Triangle's Elementary Big Smile School
name_original: Happy Triangle's Elementary Big Smile School
description:
Summary:

Help timmy find all of his crayons, but who did we find? The school's mascot, Happy Triangle! Better be quick so we don't bother it on its day off, and watch out for those sneaky hugs!

Message from the Dev:

Browser version requires that your browser supports WebGL playback, and may require turning on 'Hardware Acceleration' in your browser settings.
